document.full_text: ecuadorean president rafael correa is likely to achieve a sweeping victory in a referendum next month that calls for an overhaul of the justice system, a poll by ecuadorean pollster cedatos showed on friday.
document.title: poll gives ecuador's correa wide lead on referendum
lines_and_colors: ecuadorean president rafael correa is likely to achieve a sweeping victory in a referendum next month that calls for an overhaul of the justice system, a poll by ecuadorean pollster cedatos showed on friday.
